item.title: Allow account deletion
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:27, topic:539081”]Why would we allow you to delete your account? You’re the one who registered it and posted everything on it, we didn’t make you post it, if you’re not happy with it then go and shout at yourself in a mirrror and consider it a life lesson. We’re under no obligation to help you clean up your mess at our own expense. All this will warrant is loads of people deleting their accounts and then messing around with it, and then you’ll have like three people who will actually want to keep their account deleted.

Such controls don’t belong on this community, simply because the community is too immature to make consistent decisions. Also, let’s be realistic here, we’ve been waiting on forum code for like three years if this were to happen it’d be the vanilla package that comes with SMF (aka you can remove your account and your never getting it back again) which is a terrible idea. You’re effectively asking me why I refuse to advocate losing 2/3 of the community and having my work load greatly increased so a few old timers can be at peace, I think the idea is absurd and I know Moparisthebest shares that view.[/quote]

I’m not sure about the US laws, but this is most likely against the UK’s Data Protection Act.

Read full topic
